General.Name: AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc.
General.Description: AMC Entertainment Holdings, Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the theatrical exhibition business. The company owns, operates, or has interests in theatres in the United States and Europe. AMC Entertainment Holdings, Inc. was founded in 1920 and is headquartered in Leawood, Kansas.
General.Address: One AMC Way, Leawood, KS, United States, 66211
